message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.NE 

The paper deals with the challenges of training deep architectures for predictive tasks with limited labeled data, which is a common problem in machine learning. The proposed method involves using reinforcement learning with memory augmented neural networks and a new sampling strategy to improve the efficiency of the training process. This work is relevant to several sub-fields of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), natural language processing (cs.CL), and neural networks (cs.NE).
